entry.title: LCD Screen Assembly Compatible for Apple Watch Series 5 SE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: LCD Watch
Price: 249.99 - 264.99 (2 variants)

The screen on your 5th generation Apple Watch is cracked, scratched or has become non-responsive? This brand new watch replacement screen is what you need. Purchase this high-quality Series 5 replacement screen with the recommended repair tools and fix your Apple watch quickly. This screen assembly is compatible with Series 5 Apple watch.

Includes the Force touch Sensor flex cable gasket

For customers who demand the same standard as original repair parts, this replacement part has you covered.

Includes the Force touch Sensor flex cable

Lifetime Warranty

This replacement LCD for Series 5 Apple Watch comes with a lifetime warranty. Your iWatch replacement screen assembly will be shipped from Canada on the same business day it is purchased. Don't hesitate to contact our support team if you have any questions or concerns.

Part Type Watch LCD Screen Assembly
Compatible Model Series 5 40mm / 44mm
Model Number Series 5 Apple Watch
Manufacturer Unlockr Parts
Warranty Lifetime Warranty

entry.title: Replacement Battery Compatible For Apple Watch Series 5
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 14.99

You have a Apple Watch Series 5 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Apple Watch Series 5 shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Apple Watch Series 5 replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The Batteries for Apple Watch SeriesÂ 5 are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand theÂ same quality as original batteries.Â 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Apple Watch Series 5.

Warranty

The Replacement Apple Watch SeriesÂ 5 Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as our other battery replacement parts.

Part Type Watch Battery
Compatible Model Apple Watch SeriesÂ 5
Device Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.summary:

They have an oleophobic coating to make them oil-resistant and prevent fingerprints to ensure perfect image clarity and touch sensitivity.

The 0.2mm thickness and flexibility makes them very easy to apply.
